title: Happy Birthday, Snag!
subtle: Humorous (fiction), 120 words, Level E (Grade 1), Lexile 230L, Fiction Series
description: As the guests in Happy Birthday, Snag! arrive at the party, Bonk makes sure each has brought along a familiar birthday item, such as balloons, a cake, candles, and presents. When guests begin to wonder what Bonk has brought, he surprises the group by bringing Snag, the guest of honor. Pictures support the text and the identification of these content words in print.
meta: balloons, birthday, cake, candles, party, presents
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Medial Sound : Discriminate medial long sounds /a/ (cake) and long /i/ (pile)
VCe Pattern : Recognize VCe long vowel patterns in print and read simple VCe long vowel words
Quotation Marks : Recognize quotation marks at the beginning and end of dialogue
High-Frequency Words : Identify and understand the use of the high-frequency word put

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
